pinyin: hā luō dà jiā
en: Hello everyone

zh-Hans: 你应该知道我过一阵子要去美国了
en: you probably know that I'm going to the US soon

pinyin: bù guò nǐ yīng gāi hěn hào  qí
en: But you're probably curious

pinyin: wǒ yào qù Měi guó zuò shén me
en: why I'm going to the States

pinyin: zài zhè biān gēn dà jiā jiǎng yī xià
en: so I'll tell you guys!

pinyin: wǒ jiē xià lái huì qù Měi guó shí xí
zh-Hans: 我接下来会去美国实习

pinyin: qí shí wǒ qián yī zhèn zi jiù kāi shǐ shēn qǐng shí xí jì huà
zh-Hans: 其实我前一阵子就开始申请实习计画

pinyin: bù guò zhè ge jì huà qí shí mán tū rán de

en: but this one was quite sudden

pinyin: wǒ dà gài 6 yuè dǐ de shí hou
en: I only found out I got the internship

pinyin: zhī dào wǒ ná dào zhè ge jī huì

pinyin: rán hòu dà gài 8 yuè chū 、8 yuè zhōng jiù yào dào Měi guó
zh-Hans: 然后大概8月初、8月中就要到美国
en: and I need to arrive in the US in early or mid August

pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ zì jǐ yě shì zhè liǎng gè yuè fēi cháng de máng
zh-Hans: 所以我自己也是这两个月非常地忙
en: So I've been pretty busy these past two months

pinyin: hěn duō shì qing yào chǔ lǐ

pinyin: bù guò hǎo xiǎn mù qián qiān zhèng yě ná dào le

pinyin: nà wǒ mù qián yǐ jīng yù yuē le

pinyin: zài qù zuò zhè ge jiǎn cè jiù hǎo le

pinyin: xī wàng yí qiè shùn lì

pinyin: rán hòu wǒ xiǎng shuō
